name: schedule(after:interval:tolerance:_:)
desc: Performs the action at some time after the specified date, at the specified frequency, taking into account tolerance if possible.
declaration: func schedule(after date: Self.SchedulerTimeType, interval: Self.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, tolerance: Self.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, _ action: @escaping () -> Void) -> Cancellable
